headline: Did AMD's (AMD) Latest Tech Partnerships Redefine Its Role in AI Cloud and HPC Markets?
summary: In September 2025, a series of high-profile collaborations were announced featuring AMD's technology, including VDURA's scalable GPU reference architecture, Mission's AWS CPU instance optimizations, Absci's AI-driven drug discovery initiatives, and Exostellar's GPU-agnostic orchestration platform, all integrating AMD Instinct and EPYC processors for enterprise cloud, AI, and HPC applications. These partnerships underscore AMD's increasing traction in AI, cloud, and high-performance...
